ai-patthana24.9:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.9:1.1_0: One should not give up without seeing or cause, without reason, be given up.
ai-patthana24.9:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana24.9:2.1_0: One should not give up a teaching without seeing, without seeing the cause, with no reason.
ai-patthana24.9:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana24.9:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana24.9:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the cause of development to give up the reason for developing the skillful qualities.
ai-patthana24.9:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana24.9:4.1_0: You shouldn’t give up any things that shouldn’t be given up by developing the Teaching.
ai-patthana24.9:4.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana24.9:4.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana24.9:5.1_0: Not for the sake of seeing, nor for the sake of seeing, you should give up cause and condition.
ai-patthana24.9:6.1_0: without seeing the cause, without reason,
ai-patthana24.9:6.1_2: Five or five reasons to touch them ...
ai-patthana24.9:6.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana24.9:7.1_0: Not for the sake of developing or cultivating the teaching, they don’t give up the cause or condition for the sake of development.
ai-patthana24.9:8.1_0: You shouldn’t give up any cause or reason for the sake of developing the Teaching. You should not give up causes cause by development.
ai-patthana24.9:8.1_2: Five or five reasons to touch them ...
ai-patthana24.9:8.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana24.9:9.1_0: or thought with causes and reasons.
ai-patthana24.9:10.1_0: ‘... for the sake of three hundreds, three things have been reckoned as an instance.’
ai-patthana24.9:11.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching with no cause or reason for refuge.
ai-patthana24.9:11.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana24.9:12.1_0: or cause a reason for sake of refuge,
ai-patthana24.9:12.1_1: Not cause or reason, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana24.9:12.1_2: Not for the sake of refuge or for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana24.9:12.1_3: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana24.9:12.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
